Desc.entry: Introduces disabled or disadvantaged city children (and others) to a 130 acre working farm. Includes residential farmhouse and barn residential centre. Provides employment for people with learning disabilities. Holds annual Farm Fayre and a variety of other fundraising events. The Whirlow Hall Farm shop sells the farm's produce, including pork, lamb, beef, eggs, soft fruit and vegetables. Caf√© open on Saturdays, Sundays and bank holidays. Offers guided tours of the farm and buildings on Saturdays and Sundays and by arrangement at other times. Residential units are available for hire for private holiday and sleepover parties and farm buildings are available for parties (including children's parties) and wedding receptions.

ProviderServiceDetails.entry: Mon-Fri 9am-4.30pm (opening times); Sat, Sun & bank holiday Mondays 11am-4pm (farm open to public), plus open for pre-booked visits at all times
